# portkey_mcp_integration (Data Source)

Fetches a specific Portkey MCP integration by ID or slug.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "portkey_mcp_integration" "github" {
  id = "github-mcp-server"
}

output "mcp_server_url" {
  value = data.portkey_mcp_integration.github.url
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) MCP integration identifier (UUID or slug).

### Read-Only

- `auth_type` (String) Authentication type.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when created.
- `description` (String) Description of the MCP integration.
- `last_updated_at` (String) Timestamp when last updated.
- `name` (String) Name of the MCP integration.
- `owner_id` (String) Owner user ID.
- `slug` (String) URL-friendly identifier.
- `status` (String) Integration status.
- `transport` (String) Transport protocol.
- `type` (String) Integration type.
- `url` (String) URL of the MCP server.
- `workspace_id` (String) Workspace ID if scoped to a workspace.
